bookTitle: Attack on Titan: No Regrets, Vol. 2
bookSeries: 進撃の巨人 悔いなき選択 / Attack on Titan: No Regrets #2
bookAuthors: Hajime Isayama, Hikaru Suruga, Gan Sunaaku
Plot: REMEMBER YOUR TRUE ENEMY Erwin’s political enemies have hired Levi and his crew to take back some incriminating documents. Their reward: the right to live a proud life above ground, in the royal capital. But deep in Titan territory, it’s going to be tough to break formation and steal from a squad leader, and Levi still insists on killing the man who humiliated him after the mission is complete. Of course, beyond the walls anything can happen, and a sudden change in Levi’s fortunes will force him to face the greatest regret in his life… FINAL VOLUME!
